__e: You know, guys, this is no way to treat your number one draft choice.
In the years I've known you, you've been a good friend to me, personally, you've been a loyal friend to my party and a great ally to this country.
Now I can't speak to what happened here 20 years ago, but I do know that Tom Kane has been a great ally of mine and the citizens of Bensenville.
Your ally within the Court is aware of your plan to kill its people?
Only the time that passed against my will, during most of my life will be my ally from now on
When John aligns himself with us, we will have a ratio of forces of over 3-to-1 in our favour.
Gaius, you've long been my ally in the war against sorcery.
Typically, if someone is gonna kill you, it's a good idea to have an ally in the room.
You will need an ally in this town... maybe not now, but soon.
You'll see I'm not allied with your mother.
YOU PUT YOUR LOT IN WITH THE PEOPLE THAT ARE TRYING TO DESTROY THIS COUNTRY, YOU WERE NEVER ONE OF US TO BEGIN WITH,
You have no alliances to our side or theirs.
